SELECT a.id,a.task_name as content_name ,a.start_time as plan_start_time,a.end_time as plan_end_time, a.task_level-1 as issue_level_all, b.id as task_id,b.task_name, b.task_remark,a.project_id,b.project_id as child_project_id,b.complete_date,b.depart_name,b.company_id,c.company_name, b.start_time ,b.end_time, b.task_status, b.be_modify_id, b.task_type, b.task_level-1 as issue_level, #{isCooperator} as is_cooperator,
f.from_company_id as from_company_id
a.company_id as from_company_id
from maoding_web_project_task a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(t2.id,t1.id) as id, t1.id as be_modify_id, IF(t2.id is null,t1.task_pid,t2.task_pid) as task_pid, IF(t2.id is null,t1.task_type,t2.task_type) as task_type, IF(t2.id is null,t1.project_id,t2.project_id) as project_id, IF(t2.id is null,t1.task_name,t2.task_name) as task_name, IF(t2.id is null,t1.task_remark,t2.task_remark) as task_remark, IF(t2.id is null,t1.start_time,t2.start_time) as start_time, IF(t2.id is null,t1.end_time,t2.end_time) as end_time, IF(t2.id is null,t1.task_level,t2.task_level) as task_level, IF(t2.id is null,t1.seq,t2.seq) as seq, t1.complete_date as complete_date, t1.create_date, IF(t2.id is null,t1.company_id,t2.company_id) as company_id, IF(t2.id is null,t1.task_status,t2.task_status) as task_status, IF(t2.id is null,t1.org_id,t2.org_id) as depart_id, (select d.depart_name from maoding_web_depart d where d.id = IF(t2.id is null,t1.org_id,t2.org_id)) as depart_name from maoding_web_project_task t1 LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task t2 on t1.id = t2.be_modify_id and t2.task_status !='1' WHERE (t1.task_type = 3 and t2.id is null and t1.be_modify_id is null) or (t1.task_type = 2 and t2.id is null) or (t1.task_type=2 and t2.task_type=3)) b on a.id = b.task_pid and b.task_status!='1' LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company c on b.company_id = c.id
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task_relation f on a.id = f.task_id and f.relation_status='0'
WHERE a.task_status='0' AND a.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND f.to_company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.task_type = 2
AND a.task_type = 1
order by a.seq,b.seq,a.create_date,b.create_date

SELECT t1.id as be_modify_id,t1.task_name,t1.task_pid,t1.task_remark,t1.project_id,t1.company_id,t1.org_id as depart_id, t2.id, IF(t2.id is null,t1.start_time,t2.start_time) as start_time, IF(t2.id is null,t1.end_time,t2.end_time) as end_time from maoding_web_project_task t1 LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task t2 on t1.id = t2.be_modify_id WHERE t1.task_pid = #{taskPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ((t1.task_type = 3 and t2.id is null and t1.be_modify_id is null) or (t1.task_type = 2 and t2.id is null) or (t1.task_type=2 and t2.task_type=3)) and t1.task_status !='1'
